headline: Vistra Corp (VST) Secures Long-Term Nuclear Power Supply Agreement
summary: Vistra Corp (NYSE:VST) is one of the best Nancy Pelosi stocks to buy right now. On September 29, the company secured a long-term power supply agreement with the Comanche Peak nuclear plant. The 20-year deal is for the supply of 1,200 megawatts of power, starting in the fourth quarter of 2027. The long-term deal underscores […]
